name: Jaina Proudmoore
rules: FRONT: 3 -> Flip Jaina;BACK: Frost Focus: When an opposing hero or ally would be dealt frost ([Frost]) damage by Jaina, it's dealt that much +1 instead.
flavour: When you're cold, you spend a lot of time shivering.

name: Deep Freeze
rules:
Attach to target ally, and your hero deals 2 frost damage to it.

Ongoing: Attached ally can't attack.
flavour: When you're cold, you spend a lot of time shivering.

name: Frost Nova
rules: Your hero deals 1 frost damage to each opposing hero and ally. A character dealt damage this way can't attack this turn.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Assault on Icecrown Citadel,Class Starter Deck 2010,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)
flavour: Litori's pursuers found themselves quite literally frozen in their tracks.

name: Frostbolt
rules: Your hero deals 3 frost damage to target hero or ally. A character dealt damage this way can't attack this turn.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Assault on Icecrown Citadel,Class Starter Deck 2010,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)
flavour: “Wearing heavy plate is taxing enough without having to lug around another eighty pounds of ice.” — Warrax

name: Glacial Tomb
rules: Attach to target ally.;Ongoing: Attached ally can't attack or exhaust.
flavour: Don't worry about him - he'sss on iccce. - Lady Sira'kess

name: Ice Lance
rules: Your hero deals 2 frost damage to target ally, or 6 if that ally is ready.
reprinted: Drums Of War,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2010
flavour: It's hard to nail a moving target. An immobile one, though . . . Now that's a different story. —Velindra Sepulchre

name: Mana Agate
rules: Ongoing: (1), Destroy Mana Agate >>> Draw two cards.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Class Starter Deck 2010,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)
flavour: Magi are unique in their ability to store mana for future use without alchemical aid.

name: Whiteout
rules:
Your hero deals 3 frost damage to each opposing hero and ally.

Ongoing: Opposing heroes and allies can't attack unless their controller pays (1) for each attacker.

name: Anathel the Eagle-Eye
rules:
Elusive

When an ally with cost 4 or more enters play under your control, this ally deals 4 ranged damage to target hero.
flavour: One target . . . one shot . . . one corpse.

name: Cynthia Masters
rules:
Assault 1 (This ally has +1 ATK on your turn.)

This ally has an additional Assault 1 for each other [FROST ICON] ally you control.
flavour: Some fear the bitter cold, while I choose to embrace it.

name: Dradam Chillblade
rules: Protector (This ally may exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.)

name: Fumdol Mountainfrost
rules: When this ally enters play, Delve (Look at the top two cards of your deck. Put any number of them on top of your deck in any order, and the rest on the bottom.)

name: Kalam Blacksteel
rules: Protector (This ally may exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.)
flavour: I will give you a moment to reconsider.

name: Malar Silverfrost
rules: Protector;When this ally enters play, opposing allies have -1 [Health] this turn.

name: Roke the Ice Baron
rules:
Elusive

[Frost Icon] allies in your party have “[Activate] >>> Target ally can't attack this turn.”
flavour: Battle has left his heart as cold as his art.

name: Wendy Anne
rules: When this ally enters play, Delve. (Look at the top two cards of your deck. Put any number of them on top of your deck in any order, and the rest on the bottom.)
flavour: Clear mind, fiery heart, cold everything else—that's my motto.

name: Zooti Fizzlefury
rules: Elusive;When this ally enters play, put a 2 [Frost] / 1 [Health] Water Elemental ally token into play.
flavour: Me and 'Black Ice' have just the thing to put an end to the Firelord.

name: Demonfang Ritual Helm
rules: When an ally in your party is destroyed, each other player destroys an ally in his party.
flavour: To succeed, we must sacrifice. And by 'we,' I mean 'you.' — Forang Deathrattle

name: Wand of Ruby Claret
rules: When this equipment enters play, you may put target ability from your graveyard on top of your deck.

name: Sea Legs
rules: On your turn: Pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Put a 2 [Frost] / 1 [Health] Water Elemental ally token into play.
flavour: With this, you should find maneuvering in the sea to be nearly effortless. - Erunak Stonespeaker

name: Dark Lady Sylvanas Windrunner
rules: FRONT: 5 -> Flip Sylvanas;BACK: Song of Sylvanas: Sylvanas and allies you control have Assault 1. (They have +1 ATK on your turn.)

name: Arcane Shot
rules: Your hero deals 1 arcane damage to target hero or ally. Draw a card.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,War of the Elements,Assault on Icecrown Citadel,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Class Starter Deck 2010
flavour: A hunter's deadly accuracy doesn't just seem like magic; sometimes, it is.

name: Multi-Shot
rules: Your hero deals 2 ranged damage to each of up to three target heroes and/or allies.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Assault on Icecrown Citadel,Class Starter Deck 2010

name: Shadow
rules: Elusive (Can't be attacked.)
flavour: Joo don't want ta hear de cat's purr, mon. Joo won't never hear nothin' again. — Warmaster Bo'jo

name: Steady Shot
rules: Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero may deal 1 ranged damage to target hero or ally.
reprinted: Worldbreaker,Assault on Icecrown Citadel,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)

name: Turn the Blade
rules:
Attach to target ally or weapon.

Ongoing: Attached card has -3 ATK.
reprinted: Drums Of War,Assault on Icecrown Citadel,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)
flavour: You can do more with a bow than just fire it. —The Greatest Race of Hunters

name: Zip
rules: Ferocity (Can attack immediately.)
flavour: The cries of laughter upon seeing the tallstrider quickly turn to cries of pain.

name: Master's Embrace
rules:
Choose one: Search your deck for a Pet, reveal it, and put it into your hand; or attach to target Pet.

Ongoing: Attached Pet has +4 / +4.
flavour: “Joo serve me, and I know what’s best, mon.” —Voidbringer Jindal’an

name: Strength of Will
rules: Attach to target ally.;Ongoing: Attached ally has +2 / +2.

name: Asoren Darksnout
rules: Protector

name: Daroka Venomfist
rules: When this ally attacks, exhaust target opposing ally. (A protector exhausted this way can't protect this combat.)
flavour: Cut to the chase.

name: Draga'zal
flavour: Warchief Hellscream is twice the leader Thrakk ever was.

name: Kelena Ashford
rules: When this ally enters play, if you control a Demon or a Pet, she deals 4 fire damage to target hero.

name: Kraznix Smolderpain
rules: When this ally enters play, Delve. (Look at the top two cards of your deck. Put any number of them on top of your deck in any order, and the rest on the bottom.)
flavour: I think I left my rocket launcher next to my other rocket launcher.

name: Krezza the Explosive
rules: When this ally deals damage to an opposing hero, she also deals 2 arcane damage to target opposing ally.
flavour: Arcane powers bend to the will of the user.

name: Samantha Galvington
flavour: I have no time for your foolishness.

name: Vazu'jin
rules: Elusive (This ally can't be attacked.)
flavour: Dey can't stop what dey can't find, mon.

name: Waz'luk
rules: When Waz'luk enters play, he deals 1 fire damage to target hero.
reprinted: Through the Dark Portal,Class Starter Deck 2010,Archive (EA),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Archive
flavour: He makes quite a first impression.

name: Blackcrow
rules: When you strike with Blackcrow, your hero has long-range this combat. (Defenders deal no combat damage to it.)
reprinted: Through the Dark Portal,Class Starter Deck 2010,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)
flavour: This crossbow was once a weapon of the shadow hunter Vosh'gajin.

name: Windrunner's Heartseeker
rules: Long-Range When this weapon enters play, put two 1 [Melee] / 1 [Health] Undead ally tokens into play. This weapon has +1 ATK for each Undead you control.
flavour: May Azeroth never fail to remember the terrible price we paid for our weakness... for our pride. - Dark Lady Sylvanas Windrunner

name: Elderlimb
rules: FRONT: 4 -> Flip Elderlimb;BACK: Ancient's Lore: At the start of your turn, Elderlimb heals 4 damage from himself if you control a Treant.;;Deckbuilding: You can't put [Horde] or [Alliance] cards in your deck.
flavour: The vines grew angry, as if every weed of Azeroth sought revenge upon those who would destroy their fertile home.

name: Entangling Roots
rules:
Attach to target ally and exhaust it.

Ongoing: Attached ally can't ready during its controller's ready step.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Class Starter Deck 2010,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)
flavour: The vines grew angry, as if every weed of Azeroth sought revenge upon those who would destroy their fertile home.

name: Friends in High Places
rules: Put two Treant ally tokens into play with 1 [melee icon] ATK / 1 health.
flavour: Their bark is worse than their bite.

name: Innervate
rules: Target player draws three cards.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Class Starter Deck 2010,Heroes of Azeroth (EA)
flavour: Energy surged through her body like a raging river.

name: Mark of Goldrinn
rules: Attach to target ally.;Ongoing: Attached ally has +5 / +5.
flavour: Can you feel the spirit of Goldrinn flowing within your veins? - Wildseer Varel

name: Moonshard
rules: Your hero deals 4 arcane damage to target ally.
flavour: That which once been peaceful is now a force to be reckoned with, mon. - Kanga the Primal

name: Nature's Reach
rules:
Balance Hero Required

Ongoing: Ally tokens in your party have +1 ATK / +1 health.

(3), [Activate] >>> Put a Treant ally token into play with 1 [melee icon] ATK / 1 health.

name: Stalwart Bear Form
rules: Target up to two opposing allies. Your hero deals 2 melee damage to each of them.;Ongoing: Your hero has Protector and +5 [Health].
flavour: Adapt to each changing situation that presents itself. - Wildseer Varel

name: Verdant Boon
rules: Put a 1 [Melee] / 1 [Health] Treant ally token into play, or three if you control an ally token.
flavour: Great tree spirits, we require your aid! - Fama'sin the Lifeseer

name: Ashroot, Ancient of Lore
rules:
Protector

When this ally is dealt combat damage while defending, put a 1 [MELEE] / 1 [HEALTH] Treant ally token into play.
flavour: Nature favors those willing to learn its secrets.

name: Gilblin Bully
rules: Protector

name: Jadefire Felsworn
rules: When this ally enters play, he deals 5 shadow damage to target opposing hero unless its controller chooses and destroys an ally he controls.
flavour: The hunger of the Legion will never be sated.

name: Jadefire Hellcaller
rules: When this ally enters play, he deals 4 shadow damage to target opposing hero unless its controller chooses and discards a card.
flavour: There is always a wrong decision.

name: Jadefire Satyr
rules: While an opposing hero has 15 or more damage on it, this ally has Assault 2.

name: Jadefire Scout
rules: This ally can attack only heroes.
flavour: I embraced the demonic power of the Burning Legion long ago.

name: Jadefire Trickster
rules: This ally can attack only heroes.

name: Naz'jar Myrmidon
rules: Protector

name: Stonebranch, Ancient of War
rules:
When this ally enters play, put two 1 [Melee] / 1 [Health] Treant ally tokens into play.

Token allies you control have Ferocity. (They can attack immediately.)
flavour: Nature is a powerful force. Those who seek to subdue it never succeed in doing so permanently.

name: Branch of Nordrassil
rules: When you draw a card, you may put a 1 [Melee] / 1 [Health] Treant ally token into play.
flavour: A bough from Nordrassil has been ripped from the tree and taken deep into the Firelands. —Kalecgos

name: The Maw of Iso'rath
rules: If three or more allies you controlled dealt damage this turn: Pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: Hold steady until an opportunity presents itself, then join the battle with the rest of the shaman in cutting the tentacles down. - Earthcaller Torunscar

name: Murkdeep
rules: FRONT: 4 -> Flip Murkdeep;BACK: RwlRwlRwl!: When a Murloc ally enters play under your control, Murkdeep deals 1 nature damage to target opposing hero and heals 1 damage from himself.;;Deckbuilding: You can't put [Horde] or [Alliance] cards in your deck.

name: Elements' Fury
rules: Your hero deals 3 nature damage to target hero and 3 nature damage to target ally.
reprinted: March of the Legion,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Archive

name: Fork Lightning
rules: Your hero deals 5 nature damage to target hero and 5 nature damage to target ally.
flavour: Stick a bolt in them, they're done!

name: Greater Chain Lightning
rules:
Target up to five heroes and/or allies.

Your hero deals 5, 4, 3, 2, and 1 nature damage to them, respectively.
flavour: Don't stand so close to me! —The last words of Sordin Gumner, lead singer of the Azeroth Authority

name: Monstrous Strike
rules: Target hero or ally has +1 ATK this turn, or +4 ATK if it's a Monster.
flavour: I will sever your body from your soul with one swing of my blade. - Deathbringer Kor'ush

name: RwlRwlRwlRwl!
rules: Murloc allies you control have +1 ATK and Ferocity this turn. (They can attack immediately.)

name: Unleash the Swarm!
rules: Reveal the top seven cards of your deck. Put all revealed Murloc allies with cost 1 or less into play and the rest on the bottom of your deck.
flavour: It never ends... They just keep coming... - High Magus Olvek

name: Bobbler
rules: This and other Murloc allies you control have Assault 2.
flavour: Rr mgg Gggmlmmm Lgmlmgl m Mrrrlrml.

name: Brighteye
rules: When this or another Murloc ally enters play under your control, this ally heals 3 damage from target hero or ally.
flavour: Rr mgg Gggmlmmm Lgmlmgl m Ggmgl.

name: Bubblegil
rules: This and other Murloc allies you control have Protector. (They may exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.)
flavour: Lmmmlgml Mmgrrrmrm Lmrrlrmm Mrlmgmgg lgmlmm Lgrrlmm.

name: Chumly
rules: This and other Murloc allies you control have +1 / +1.
flavour: Rr MGG Ggmmmlmrmgmg!

name: Crabbyfin
rules: When this or another Murloc ally enters play under your control, you may put a 1 [Melee] / 1 [Health] Crab Monster ally token into play.
flavour: Rr mgg Rlrrglmg gmmr lgmlmm Lrmmm.

name: Gobbler
rules: When Gobbler attacks, you may search your deck for a Murloc, reveal it, and put it into your hand.;When Gobbler or another Murloc ally you control is destroyed, each opponent chooses and destroys an ally he controls.

name: Swarmtooth
rules: When this or another Murloc ally enters play under your control, you may reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a Murloc, put it into your hand.
flavour: Rr MGG Ggmmmkmrmgmg!

name: Platinum Shield of the Valorous
rules: Platinum Shield of the Valorous has +1 DEF for each face-down resource you have.
flavour: Attack fiercely, but be ready for a counter! Knowing when to raise your shield will save your hide! — Hekto Starspire

name: Blackout Truncheon
rules: When Blackout Truncheon enters play, exhaust target hero or ally. That character can't ready during its controller's next ready step.

name: An Ancient Awakens
rules:
You pay [1] less to complete this quest for each Monster hero and/or ally you control.

Pay [6] to complete this quest.

Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: My children and I. Slow to anger. But our wrath is final. —Tortolla

name: Hogger
rules: FRONT: 5 -> Flip Hogger;BACK: Summon Minion: At the start of your turn, put a 1 [Melee] / 1 [Health] Gnoll Monster ally token into play.;Deckbuilding: You can't put [Horde] or [Alliance] cards in your deck.

name: Brutal Strike
rules: Choose one: Your hero deals 1 melee damage to target ally; or destroy target damaged ally.

name: Crushing Strike
rules: Destroy target opposing equipment. If you do, your hero may deal 3 melee damage to its controller's hero.
flavour: Armor can do only so much. - Peter Hottelet

name: Execute
rules: Destroy target ally with damage on it.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Worldbreaker,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Class Starter Deck 2010
flavour: Showing weakness to a warrior is a death sentence.

name: Monstrous Cleave
rules: Target up to two allies. Your hero deals 4 melee damage to the first target. If you control two or more Monster heroes and/or allies, your hero deals 4 melee damage to the second target.

name: Monstrous Upheaval
rules: Your hero deals 2 melee damage to target hero or ally for each Monster hero and ally you control.

name: Vitality
rules:
Protection Hero Required

Ongoing: At the start of your turn, put a might counter on Vitality.

For each might counter, your hero has +1 ATK while attacking and +1 health.

name: Brogre
rules: On your turn: [2] -> Target Ogre ally has +3 ATK this turn.
flavour: “Me make strong so can SMASH!”

name: Drugush the Crusher
flavour: Come here, little thing, so I can smash you.

name: Grag'tok
rules: When an ally with 6 or more ATK enters play under your control, this ally deals 1 fire damage to each opposing hero and ally.
flavour:
“This flame will burn you to ash. —Grag

Then we stomp you to the ground!” —Tok

name: Mindbender Ghur'sha
rules: While you control one or more other Monster heroes and/or allies, Ghur'sha has Ferocity.;While you control two or more other Monster heroes and/or allies, Ghur'sha has Assault 4.;While you control three or more other Monster heroes and/or allies, Ghur'sha has Invincible.
flavour: Is. This. Reality?

name: Nibbler
rules: When this or another Murloc ally enters play under your control, it deals 1 melee damage to target opposing hero.
flavour: Rmmmlg Rr'gg Glgmlg Mllmmmmggmgl.

name: Tar'gak the Felcrazed
rules: You pay 1 less to play this ally for each Monster hero and ally you control.

name: Throk the Conqueror
rules: This ally can't attack unless you control another ally with 6 or more ATK.
flavour: You not bigger than ME!

name: Belt of Absolute Zero
rules: Weapons you control have +1 ATK.
flavour: How well does the mortal shell handle extreme temperature change? —Maloriak

name: Gurubashi Punisher
rules: You pay [6] less to strike with this weapon while you control an ally with 6 or more ATK.
flavour: Dey all serve Gurubashi, one way or de other . . . —Zanzil

name: Sulfuras, The Extinguished Hand
rules: When an ally you control deals damage on your turn, you may add a +1 ATK counter to this weapon for each damage dealt.
flavour: Be consumed by flame! —Ragnaros

name: Cleaning House
rules:
If you control an ally with 6 or more ATK: Pay [2] to complete this quest.

Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: Kill Gar'gol's minions in Goldrinn's name! —Ian Duran

name: Wake of Destruction
rules: If you control two or more Monster heroes and/or allies: Pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: Use this orb to subdue them, then direct them against our enemy. - Erunak Stonespeaker

name: Waking the Beast
rules: Pay 1 to complete this quest.;Reward: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a Monster ally, put it into your hand, Otherwise, leave it on top of your deck,
flavour: Make yourself ready... I will now tell Nespirah to begin the countdown. - Earthmender Duarn

name: Rhonin
rules: (2), Discard a Mage with cost X >>> Interrupt target card with cost X.
flavour: We stand to lose everything if we do not stop fighting and work together!

name: Bath'rah the Windwatcher
rules: When each Shaman you control exhausts for the first time each turn, you may ready it.
flavour: Joo gonna be a masta of da elements someday, dis I promise, mon.

name: Hemet Nesingwary
rules: Hunters you control can be exhausted to pay costs as though they were resources.
flavour: Listen to me, lad, and I'll teach you everything you'll ever need to know.

name: Klannoc Macleod
rules: (1), Put 1 damage on a Warrior you control >>> It has +1 ATK this turn.
flavour: “In the end, there can be only one.”

name: Lord Darion Mograine
rules: (1), Destroy a Death Knight you control >>> Put a 3 [melee icon] / 3 [Health Icon] Ghoul ally token into play.
flavour: “Although our kind have no place in your world, we will fight to bring an end to the Lich King. This I vow.”

name: Lord Jorach Ravenholdt
rules: (1), Exhaust a Rogue you control >>> Exhaust target hero or ally.
flavour: “All who wish to hone their skills as assassins and thieves are welcome in Ravenholdt Manor.”

name: Mor'zul Bloodbringer
rules: (1), Remove a Warlock ally you control from the game >>> Remove target ally from the game.
flavour: “You don’t know the true meaning of sacrifice. I’ll teach you . . . for a price.”

name: Aurius
rules: When a friendly Paladin is destroyed, it may deal 3 unpreventable holy damage to target hero or ally.
flavour: “Before I submit to this impending death, there is one last thing I must do.”

name: Eris Havenfire
rules: When this or another Priest ally enters play under your control, the next time target hero or ally would be dealt damage this turn, prevent it.
flavour: “I failed once before, but perhaps you . . . ?”

name: Keeper Remulos
rules: When a Druid you control deals combat damage to a hero, put two 1 [Melee Icon] / 1 [Health Icon] Treant ally tokens into play.
flavour: “Is the world prepared for what we are about to invoke? I do not know . . .”

name: Bloodbane's Fall
rules: Your hero has Assault 1. (+1 ATK on your turn.)
reprinted: ScourgeWar,Class Starter Deck 2010,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)

name: Lightning Whelk Axe
flavour: Each strike unleashes a torrent! - Samaku, Hand of the Tempest

name: Blueleaf Tubers
rules: Pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Shuffle your graveyard into your deck.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring)
flavour: Those tubers are impossible to find unless you know just where to look. That's why I've trained these snufflenose gophers to find them for me.

name: The Culmination of Our Efforts
rules: Pay 4 to complete this quest.;Reward: Choose ability, ally, equipment, or quest and reveal the top five cards of your deck. Put a revealed card of the chosen type into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.
flavour: Victory is only a matter of time. - Lady Naz'jar

name: Entrenched
rules: If you control an ally: Pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
reprinted: War of the Elements,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring)
flavour: Diamant says you are to be trusted. Diamant is patient and wise, so I shall allow you to prove yourself. - Kor the Immovable

name: The Key to Freedom
rules: Pay 4 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: The small brass key looks simple enough.

name: Seeds of Their Demise
rules: Pay 0 to complete this quest.;Reward: Delve (Look at the top two cards of your deck. Put any number of them on top of your deck in any order, and the rest on the bottom.)
flavour: I need you to harvest some bileberries from the wailing weeds that surround this tower. - Tyrus Blackhorn

name: The Last Living Lorekeeper
rules: On your turn: Pay 5 to complete this quest.;Reward: your hero heals 3 damage from itself. Draw a card
flavour: I... have not yet... perished. - Nordu

name: Face of Fear
rules: Put target ally into its owner's hand.
flavour: Stand before it, if you dare. - Skodis the Nethertwister

name: Deathsmasher Mogdar
flavour: I follow Kor'ush, even to another death.

name: Gilblin Plunderer
rules: Empower Monster: When this ally enters play, if you control another Monster hero or ally, you may destroy target equipment

name: Neferset Darkcaster
flavour: The traitorous Neferset couldn't resist the deal set before them by Al'Akir and Deathwing.

name: Gutfin
rules: This and other Murloc allies you control have +1 [Health].
flavour: Mrmmmmrm Lgmlmm Lmmmlrmrrr Mrrrgl.

name: Murloc Coastrunner
flavour: Mlmmlmmm Ggmggmmlr Lgmlmm Lrmmgmlmgg!
